After 2 open box and 1 brand new printer, it's fair to say that quality control lacking.

* Marker pens, not black (Sharpie and paint markers)
* [5.5mm](https://www.mcmaster.com/8393A44), [7mm](https://www.mcmaster.com/8393A46), and [8mm](https://www.mcmaster.com/8393A47) tight clearance wrenches
* 1.5mm, 2mm, 2.5mm, and 3mm [Wera Hex Plus](https://www.mcmaster.com/hex-plus-keys/system-of-measurement~metric/) keys
* check 4mm and 5mm hex keys
